Trade/Device Name(s): PIVO™ Pro Needle-free Blood Collection Device
Submitter Information: Becton Dickinson Infusion Therapy Systems Inc.
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for PIVO™ Pro Needle-free Blood Collection Device for venous blood specimen collection from IV catheters, including blood culture.
Indications for Use Summary: Attaches to peripheral IV catheter system to obtain venous blood specimens into vacuum tube, blood culture bottle, or syringe from adult and pediatric patients, including those with difficult intravenous access; suitable for blood culture collection at initial IV catheter placement.
